title: Online Quiz-Based College Mathematics Foundational Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Operated in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, applying flexible learning schedules considering workplace integration for employees

learning_goals: Learners can solve algebraic equations and basic calculus problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners review concepts three or more times through weekly automated quizzes, improving comprehension by over 70%.
Learners perform self-directed learning with over 90% participation by utilizing digital resources provided in an online quiz system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
